meanings.sent1: She resewed the button onto her shirt.
meanings.sent2: After the thread broke, she resewed it securely.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally resewed his sleeve to his pants!
meanings.sent4: The community resewed their bonds of friendship after the misunderstanding.
meanings.sent5: The tailor carefully resewed the torn seam, making it stronger than before.

meanings.sent1: I had to resew the hem on my dress.
meanings.sent2: She resewed the torn teddy bear for her little sister.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to resew the curtains with its claws.
meanings.sent4: The teacher resewed the class together after a disagreement.
meanings.sent5: He resewed the patch onto his backpack, ensuring it wouldn't fall off again.

meanings.sent1: The resewed dress looked as good as new.
meanings.sent2: The resewed quilt was a cherished family heirloom.
meanings.sent3: The resewed toy had a unique patchwork appearance.
meanings.sent4: Her resewed scarf was a blend of different fabrics.
meanings.sent5: The resewed flag fluttered proudly in the wind.
